file-api-desc: Implements file downloads via the action api for consumption by any client, including api-only clients (e. g. via bot password or OAuth)
apihelp-download-description: Downloads a file stored in the file namespace through the action api
apihelp-download-summary: Downloads a file stored in the file namespace through the action api
apihelp-download-param-title: The media file title to retrieve
apihelp-download-param-pageid: The pageid of the media file to retrieve
